protection: Lightweight, long-sleeved shirts and trousers covering the skin. Pair it with a wide-brimmed hat.
sunscreen: Put on daily sunscreen of at least 15 SPF.

protection: Densely woven fabric through which light cannot pass. Wide brimmed hat that covers your ears, face and back of the neck. Also put on some sunglasses.
sunscreen: Wear sunscreen of at least 30 SPF.

protection: Opt for clothes with a Ultraviolet Protection Factor (UPF) label for maximum protection. Pair them with a broad brimmed hat and UV-blocking sunglasses.
Opt for clothes with a Ultraviolet Protection Factor (UPF) label for maximum protection. Pair them with a broad brimmed hat and UV-blocking sunglasses.
Minimize sun exposure and opt for clothes with UPF 50+ rating. Broad brimmed hat, UV blocking sunglasses and put on some gloves as well.
sunscreen: Wear sunscreen of 30+(broad spectrum) SPF and reapply sunscreen often (at least every two hours).
